about_the_game:
"

Devin Night Animated Token Pack 151: Holy Warriors

A pack of 40 Holy Warriors, Animated by YourToyRobot and optimized for play on Fantasy Grounds Unity by Doug Davison. These tokens are identical to the tokens in the Holy Warriors pack. Just animated. This pack includes:
  • F human acolyte blue
  • F human acolyte
  • F_Human_Acolyte2
  • F_Human_Acolyte2_A
  • F_Human_Acolyte3
  • F_human_acolyte3_a
  • F_Human_Acolyte4 a
  • F_Human_Acolyte4
  • F_Human_TempleKnight shield
  • F_Human_TempleKnight
  • F_Human_TempleKnight2 shield A
  • F_Human_TempleKnight2 shield
  • F_Human_TempleKnight2
  • F_Human_TempleKnight2B
  • F_Human_TempleKnight2_A shield
  • F_Human_TempleKnight2_A
  • F_Human_TempleKnighta shield
  • F_Human_TempleKnighta
  • F_Human_TempleKnight_A shield
  • F_Human_TempleKnight_A
  • F_Human_TempleKnight_P shield
  • F_Human_TempleKnight_P
  • F_Human_warrior
  • F_Human_warrior_P
  • F_War_Cleric
  • F_War_Cleric_A
  • M_Battle_Mage
  • M_Battle_MageA
  • M_Dwarf_Bomber
  • M_Dwarf_Warrior
  • M_EagleKnight
  • M_EagleKnight_A
  • M_Gray_Night
  • M_Gray_Night_A
  • M_Human Mage
  • M_Human Mage_A
  • M_Human_TempleKnight
  • M_Human_TempleKnight2
  • M_Human_TempleKnight2_A
  • M_Human_TempleKnightA
"

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
